name: Leverton
description: AI-powered lease abstraction and CAM clause recognition designed for large commercial portfolios.
target_audience_match: Perfect for asset managers overwhelmed by complex portfolios who need instant visibility into CAM terms.

name: Prophia
description: Commercial lease AI built specifically to handle rent roll insights, CAM details, and landlord reporting.
target_audience_match: Ideal for landlord reps and brokers who dread CAM season and need automated clarity across leases.

name: Occupier
description: Modern lease management built for tenants and landlords with detailed CAM charge and rent tracking.
target_audience_match: Great for smaller landlords or tenants stressed by unpredictable CAM bills and tracking obligations manually.

name: LeasePilot
description: Draft and abstract commercial leases with CAM logic directly into lease docs using AI templates.
target_audience_match: Perfect for legal and leasing teams racing to finalize deals without missing CAM specifics.

name: Visual Lease
description: Full-featured lease accounting and management with robust CAM allocation, forecasting, and compliance tools.
target_audience_match: Best for enterprise landlords managing complex portfolios who can't afford CAM errors or compliance risks.
